author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary: ...DEPRESSION FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... As of 8:00 PM PDT Fri Oct 24 the center of Eighteen-E was located near 13.2, -116.6 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... As of 8:00 PM PDT Fri Oct 24 the center of Eighteen-E was located near 13.2, -116.6 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Eighteen-E (EP3/EP182025)
